import React from 'react'; import { MaintenanceIcon } from './Icons'; export default function BuildingCard({ building, onEdit, onDelete }) { const statusLabel = building.status === 'inactive' ? 'ÿ∫Ÿäÿ± ŸÜÿ¥ÿ∑' : building.status === 'maintenance' ? 'ÿµŸäÿßŸÜÿ©' : 'ŸÜÿ¥ÿ∑'; const statusClass = building.status === 'inactive' ? 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-700' : building.status === 'maintenance' ? 'bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800' : 'bg-green-100 text-green-700'; return (
{building.status === 'maintenance' && } {statusLabel}
